posts.title: Terrifying Toilet Decals
posts.content: Add some character to your bathroom by anthropomorphizing your lifeless possessions using these terrifying toilet decals. The set includes six sheets filled with horrifying and colorful peelable decals that are designed to be placed inside your porcelain goddess.

posts.title: Window Cleaning Robot
posts.content: Keep all the windows in your humble abode looking crystal clear all year round with the window cleaning robot. This handy appliance can be controlled by remote and will leave windows so spotless you’ll be bumping into them after the first wash.

posts.title: Alcohol Shot Gun
posts.content: Get blackout wasted in record time when you show up to the party armed with the alcohol shot gun. Just pour a shot of your favorite liquor, cock, aim and shoot – it’s the most entertaining and efficient way to deliver massive amounts of alcohol to the body.

posts.title: Bearded Viking Beanie
posts.content: Stay warm while looking like a viking warlord with this bearded viking beanie. The bearded viking beanie is crafted from 100% acrylic yarn and features a majestic burly detachable beard that will keep your face nice and warm on cold winter days.

posts.title: Stripper Sloth Shower Curtain
posts.content: Make it rain in your shower with this adorably sexy stripper sloth shower curtain. But be warned, when Lisa the sloth takes to the stage she’s anything but lazy. This head turning sloth has sultry moves and loves to climb – for the money.

posts.title: Wall Climbing Remote Control Cars
posts.content: Experience the madness of extreme indoor car racing by defying gravity with the wall climbing remote control cars. These wonder cars don’t just stop when they hit vertical surfaces, they keep going and tackle just about anything such as walls, windows, and even ceilings.

posts.title: Star Wars Tiki Cups
posts.content: Add a geeky touch to your tropical fiesta with these Star Wars tiki cups. Each ceramic mug features a 14 ounce capacity and is available in 1 of 6 character designs including Darth Vader, Boba Fett, Chewbacca, and Yoda.

posts.title: Gerber Hatchet Camping Axe
posts.content: If you need something cut or chopped at the campsite, the Gerber hatchet camping axe is the tool for the job! Though it may be compact, this handheld axe features a full tang construction with an ergonomic handle and a razor sharp stainless steel blade.

posts.title: Air Drumming Percussion Instrument
posts.content: Perfect your percussion technique without receiving noise complaints from the neighbors by using this air drumming percussion instrument. It’s compatible with both Windows and Apple operating systems and is portable enough to take virtually anywhere.

posts.title: Penguin Water Bottles
posts.content: Stay hydrated in style by swapping out you plastic bottle for one of these adorable penguin water bottles.  Each 8.5 ounce bottle features a high borosilicate glass interior and a tough TPE/ABS plastic exterior designed to look like a cute little colorful penguin.

posts.title: Alarm Clock Carpet
posts.content: Oversleeping will become a thing of the past when waking up with the alarm clock carpet. The ingenious design forces you to physically get out of bed in order to deactivate the annoying beep while a helpful LED display informs you of the time.

posts.title: Inflatable Car Bed
posts.content: Make the most out of your horrible living conditions with the inflatable car bed. This versatile resting aid will pop up in minutes and provide you the highest level of comfort while you cry yourself to sleep and reminisce over better days.
